title: Q15
prompt: Which word would <u>best</u> fit in the blank to clarify the transition between ideas?
feedback: The correct answer is “Nonetheless.” The sentence should read: “Nonetheless, even in the harsh environment of the Challenger Deep, life thrives.” This sentence asks you to choose a transitional word that makes sense in the passage. The word “nonetheless” shows contrast with the previous information. Since the passage is talking about the harshness of the Challenger Deep, the fact that life thrives there contrasts with the preceding information. The words “meanwhile,” “moreover,” and “conversely” don’t make sense in the context.
